channel.title: POSLink UI Design and User Guide
channel.description: Recent content on POSLink UI Design and User Guide

item.description: Common Confirmation Intents # This page describes all implict common intents that BroadPOS app can use to perform actions to confirm action. Start UI # BroadPOS might show status like CardStatus.CARD_REMOVAL_REQUIRED before start any Activity Action. In such case, it’s hard to choose default ui or customized ui to show status. So we add this action. In insert any time case, if customized app implements this action, BroadPOS will call customized app to foreground.

Host Dependent Confirmation Intents # This page describes all host-dependent implict intents that BroadPOS app can use to perform actions to confirm action. Card Will Be Deactivated, Are You Sure?? # Action ConfirmationEntry.ACTION_CHECK_DEACTIVATE_WARN Category ConfirmationEntry.CATEGORY Input Extras EntryExtraData.PARAM_PACKAGE The package name of BroadPOS app which started activity Type: String Mandatory EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_TYPE Transaction type. Example: “CREDIT SALE” Type: String Mandatory EntryExtraData.PARAM_TRANS_MODE The transaction mode BroadPOS is running in. Default Value is TransMode.
